Verses: 1 aasaariyargale, Idhaik Kelungal; Isravel Vamsaththaare, Gavaniyungal; Raajaavin Veettaare, Sevikodungal; Indha Nyaaya Visaarippu Ungalmel Sellum; Neengal Mispaavil Kanniyum Thaaborinmel Virikkappatta Valaiyumaaneergal.
2 nerithavarinavargal Migudhiyum Vadhaiseygiraargal; Avargal Ellaaraiyum Naan Dhandippen.
3 eppiraayeemai Naan Ariven, Isravel Enakku Maraivaanadhalla; Eppiraayeeme, Ippodhu Nee Soramponaaye, Isravel Theettuppattadhe.
4 avargal Thangal Dhevanidaththukkuth Thirumbuvadharkuth Thangal Kiriyaigalai Seerthiruththamaattaargal, Vesiththana Aavi Avargal Ullaththil Irukkiradhu; Karththarai Ariyaargal.
5 isravelin Agandhai Avargal Mugaththukku Munbaaga Saatchiyidugiradhu; Aagaiyaal Isravelum Eppiraayeemum Thangal Akkiramaththinaal Idarundu Vizhuvaargal; Avargalode Yoodhaavum Idarundu Vizhuvaan.
6 avargal Karththaraith Thedumpadi Thangal Aadugalodum Thangal Maadugalodum Povaargal; Avaraik Kaanamaattaargal; Avar Avargalai Vittu Vilaginaar.
7 karththarukku Virodhamaaga Dhrogampanninaargal; Anniyapillaigalaip Petraargal; Ippodhum Oru Maadhaththukkullaaga Avargal Thangal Pangugalode Patchikkappaduvaargal.
8 kibiyaavile Ekkaalaththaiyum, Raamaavile Poorigaiyaiyum Oodhungal; Peththaavenile Kadharungal; Benyameene Unnaip Pinthodarugiraargal.
9 dhandippin Naalile Eppiraayeem Paazhaavaan; Nichchayamaai Varappogiradhai Isravelin Koththirangalukkulle Arivikkiren.
10 yoodhaavin Prabukkal Ellaigalai Odhukkugiravargalukku Oppaanaargal; Avargalmel En Ukkirakobaththaith Thanneeraippola Ootruven.
11 eppiraayeem Thagaadha Karpanaiyai Manadhaarap Pinpatripponapadiyaal Avan Odungundu, Nyaayavisaaranaiyil Norukkappattuppogiraan.
12 naan Eppiraayeemukkup Pottarippaippolavum, Yoodhaavin Veettukku Uluppaippolavum Iruppen.

13 eppiraayeem Than Vyaadhiyaiyum, Yoodhaa Than Kaayaththaiyum Kandapodhu, Eppiraayeem Aseeriyanandaikkuppoi Yaarep Raajaavinidaththil Aalanuppinaan; Aanaalum Ungalai Gunamaakkavum Ungalil Irukkira Kaayaththai Aatravum Avanaal Koodaamarpoyitru.
14 naan Eppiraayeemukku Singampolavum, Yoodhaavin Vamsaththaarukkup Paalasingampolavum Iruppen; Naan Naane Peerivittup Poividuven; Thappuvippaar Illaamaiyaal Eduththukkondupoven.
15 avargal Thangal Kutrangalai Unarndhu, En Mugaththaith Thedumattum Naan En Sthaanaththukkuth Thirumbippoividuven; Thangal Aabaththil Ennaik Karuththaaith Theduvaargal.
